title: Desire (Mogma) - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Mature   Seinen
tags: Betrayal   Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Dishonest Protagonist   Evil Protagonist   Gods   Magic   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Psychopaths   R-18   R*pe   Ruthless Protagonist   S*x Friends   Shameless Protagonist   Strategist   Transported to Another World   Virtual Reality
author: Mogma   목마
description:
Very first multiplay, a virtual world where superpowers, magic, martial arts coexist.

Gang Ajin, who mastered ‘wind of martial arts’ enters there as a beta tester.

‘If killing monsters and NPCs are a benefit, then why shouldn’t I kill?’

Ajin is a sociopath who would do anything to become stronger. And the transcendents, who believe he can accomplish their wishes, pay close attention to him.

A world where strong cravings and twisted relationships interlock. And the slowly growing Ajin’s jounery starts!>
